task:
Browse Best Buy products:
1. Use navigate action to go to https://www.bestbuy.com
2. Wait 3 seconds
3. Scroll down to see featured products
4. Wait 2 seconds
5. Click on 'Laptops & Computers' category
6. Wait 3 seconds
7. Scroll down to see product listings
8. Wait 2 seconds
9. Click on the first laptop product
10. Wait 3 seconds for product page to load
11. Scroll down to see details
12. Wait 2 seconds
13. Use done action
